description: Public documentation for Paubox's Transactional Email API  ## Authentication  **IMPORTANT**: This API uses a custom authentication format that requires the "Token token=" prefix.  All requests must include the Authorization header in this exact format: ``` Authorization: Token token=YOUR_API_KEY ```  **Note for Code Generation Tools**: Auto-generated code from this specification may need to be modified to include the "Token token=" prefix, as most generators expect standard Bearer token format.
